author: bridge-bot
content:
<adietrichs> Hi all! Following up on the working group calls announced on last week's RollCall (sorry for not doing so sooner!): It took a while to sort out the details, so we decided to postpone the first topic ("Precompile RIP explorations") to the end of the call series. With that, the confirmed schedule will be:

Jan 17 (today): No call
Jan 24: EIP-4844 readiness check
Jan 31: Fee Markets for L2 EVMs
Feb 07: Precompile RIP explorations
Feb 14: RollCall #3

Always same time slots as the usual RollCall. I will post an agenda and zoom links before each call. Sorry again for the late announcement of today's postponement, and see you next week for the EIP-4844 readiness check!
